titleStmt.title: The nonconformists advocate, or, A farther account of their judgment in certain things in which they are misunderstood written principally in vindication of A letter from a minister to a person of quality, shewing some reasons for his nonconformity, modesty answering the exceptions of two violent opposers of the said reasons.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

titleStmt.title: The nonconformists advocate, or, A farther account of their judgment in certain things in which they are misunderstood written principally in vindication of A letter from a minister to a person of quality, shewing some reasons for his nonconformity, modesty answering the exceptions of two violent opposers of the said reasons.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Written by Richard Baxter. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
